Title: Capri-Revolution
Actors: Marianna Fontana, Reinout Scholten van Aschat, Antonio Folletto, Jenna Thiam
Plot: With Italy about to go to war in 1914, this is the story of the encounter between a goatherd called Lucia, the commune of young Northern Europeans led by Seybu and the town's young doctor on the unique island of Capri.
Language: Italian, Neapolitan, English, French, German, Russian
